mini pullover - by gogoknit 2 abbreviations bor - beginning of round k - knit k tbl- knit through the back loop p - purl st s - stitch es increases rli - right lifted increase lift the right leg of the stitch below the next stitch on the left needle place it onto the left needle and knit it through the front loop lli - left lifted increase lift the left leg of the stitch two row below the last stitch on the right needle place it onto the left needle and knit it through the back loop note you can use m1l and m1r instead of rli and lli i used lifted increases to prevent the raglan stitches from pulling due to the yarn characteristics decreases k2tog - knit two together insert the right needle into the next two stitches knitwise and knit them together as one stitch ssk -slip slip knit slip 1 stitch knitwise slip the next stitch knitwise insert the left needle into the front of these two stitches from left to right and knit them together through the back loops instruction starts here these instructions are written for double-pointed needles dpns however feel free to adjust the stitch distribution on each needle in whichever way is easiest for you if you prefer to use the magic loop method you may adapt the instructions accordingly yoke and body cast on 28 stitches using 3 mm us 2½ one dpn use the long-tail cast-on method or your preferred cast-on method setup distribute the stitches evenly onto four needles as follows tiny knit ornament -
